original: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
analyzed: sati sambojjhaṅaḥ dhamma vicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ vīriya sambojjhaṅgaḥ pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ passaddhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ samādhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ upekkhā sambojjhaṅgaḥ

original: Idha bhikkhu satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato, cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā hoti anussaritā—
analyzed: idha bhikkhu satimā hoti paramena sati nepakkena samannāgataḥ cirakatam pi cira bhāsitam pi saritā hoti anussaritā

original: So tathā sato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati pavicarati parivīmaṁsamāpajjati—
analyzed: so tathā sataḥ viharantaḥ tam dhammam paññāya pavicinati pavicarati parivīmasam āpajjati

original: Tassa taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicarato parivīmaṁsamāpajjato āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ—
analyzed: tassa tam dhammam paññāya pavicinataḥ pavicarataḥ parivīmasamāpajjataḥ āraddham hoti vīriyam a sallīna
pīti manassa kāyaḥ api passambhati cittam api passambhati

original: So tathā samāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti—
analyzed: saḥ tathā samāhitam cittam sādhukam ajjhupekkhitā hoti

original: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
analyzed: sati sambojjhaṅaḥ dhamma vicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ vīriya sambojjhaṅgaḥ pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ passaddhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ samādhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ upekkhā sambojjhaṅgaḥ

original: Atthi ajjhattaṁ dhammesu sati, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu sati.
analyzed: atthi ajjhattam dhammesu sati atthi bahiddhā dhammesu sati

original: Yadapi ajjhattaṁ dhammesu sati tadapi satisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: yat api ajjhattam dhammesu sati tat api sati sambojjhaṅgaḥ abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu sati tadapi satisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: yat api bahiddhā dhammesu sati tat api sati sambojjhaṅgaḥ abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Atthi ajjhattaṁ dhammesu pavicayo, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu pavicayo.
analyzed: atthi ajjhattam dhammesu pavicayaḥ atthi bahiddhā dhammesu pavicayaḥ

original: Yadapi ajjhattaṁ dhammesu pavicayo tadapi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: yat api ajjhattam dhammesu pavicayaḥ tat api dhamma vicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu pavicayo tadapi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: yat api bahiddhā dhammesu pavicayo tat api dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Atthi kāyikaṁ vīriyaṁ, atthi cetasikaṁ vīriyaṁ.
analyzed: atthi kāyikam vīriya atthi cetasikam vīriya

original: Yadapi kāyikaṁ vīriyaṁ tadapi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: yat api kāyikam vīriyam tat api vīriya sambojjhaṅgaḥ abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Yadapi cetasikaṁ vīriyaṁ tadapi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: yat api cetasikam vīriyam tat api vīriya sambojjhaṅgaḥ abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Atthi savitakkasavicārā pīti, atthi avitakkaavicārā pīti.
analyzed: atthi sa vitakka sa vicārā pi iti atthi avitakka avicārā pi iti

original: Yadapi savitakkasavicārā pīti tadapi pītisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: yat api sa vitakka sa vicārā pīti tat api pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Yadapi avitakkaavicārā pīti tadapi pītisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: yat api avitakka avicārā pīti tat api pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati
atthi kāya passaddhi atthi citta passaddhi

original: Yadapi kāyapassaddhi tadapi passaddhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: yat api kāya passaddhi tat api passaddhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Yadapi cittapassaddhi tadapi passaddhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: yat api citta passaddhi tat api passaddhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Atthi savitakko savicāro samādhi, atthi avitakko avicāro samādhi.
analyzed: atthi sa vitakko sa vicāraḥ samādhi atthi a vitakkaḥ a vicāraḥ samādhi

original: Yadapi savitakko savicāro samādhi tadapi samādhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: yat api sa vitakkaḥ sa vicāraḥ tat api samādhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Yadapi avitakko avicāro samādhi tadapi samādhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: yat api a vitakkaḥ a vicāraḥ samādhi tat api samādhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Atthi ajjhattaṁ dhammesu upekkhā, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu upekkhā.
analyzed: atthi ajjhattam dhammesu upekkhā atthi bahiddhā dhammesu upekkhā

original: Yadapi ajjhattaṁ dhammesu upekkhā tadapi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: yat api ajjhattam dhammesu upekkhā tat api upekkhā sambojjhaṅgaḥ abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu upekkhā tadapi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: yat api bahiddhā dhammesu upekkhā tat api upekkhā sambojjhaṅgaḥ abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
analyzed: sati sambojjhaṅaḥ dhamma vicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ vīriya sambojjhaṅgaḥ pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ passaddhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ samādhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ upekkhā sambojjhaṅgaḥ

original: Idha bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ,
analyzed: idha bhikkhu sati sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka nissitam virāga nissitam nirodha nissitam vossagga pariṇāmi

original: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
analyzed: upekkhā sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka nissitam virāga nissitam nirodha nissitam vossagga pariṇāmi

original: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
analyzed: sati sambojjhaṅaḥ dhamma vicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ vīriya sambojjhaṅgaḥ pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ passaddhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ samādhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ upekkhā sambojjhaṅgaḥ

original: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ
analyzed: idha bhikkhu yasmin samaye lokuttaram jhānam bhāveti niyyānikam apacaya gāmim diṭṭhi gatāna

original: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
analyzed: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicca iva kāmehi pe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye satta bojjhaṅgā honti—
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam tasmin samaye satta bojjhaṅgāḥ honti

original: Yā sati anussati …pe… sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
analyzed: yā sati anussati pe sammāsati sati sambojjhaṅgaḥ maggaṅgam magga pariyāpanna

original: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
analyzed: yā paññā pajānanā pe amohaḥ dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ maggaṅgam magga pariyāpanna

original: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho …pe… sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
analyzed: yaḥ cetasikaḥ vīriya ārambhaḥ pe sammāvāyāmaḥ vīriya sambojjhaṅgaḥ maggaṅgam magga pariyāpanna

original: Yā pīti pāmojjaṁ āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti odagyaṁ attamanatā cittassa pītisambojjhaṅgo—
analyzed: yā pīti pāmojjam āmodanā pamodanā hāsaḥ pahāsaḥ vitti odagyam atta mana tā cittassa pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ

original: Yā vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa viññāṇakkhandhassa passaddhi paṭippassaddhi passambhanā paṭippassambhanā paṭippassambhitattaṁ passaddhisambojjhaṅgo—
analyzed: yā vedanā kkhandhassa saññā kkhandhassa saṅkhāra kkhandhassa viññāṇa kkhandhassa passaddhi paṭippassaddhi passambhanā paṭippassambhanā paṭippassambhi tattam passaddhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ

original: Yā cittassa ṭhiti …pe… sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
analyzed: yā cittassa ṭhiti pe sammāsamādhi samādhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ maggaṅgam magga pariyāpanna

original: Yā upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo—
analyzed: yā upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhatta tā cittassa upekkhā sambojjhaṅgo

original: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ
analyzed: idha bhikkhu yasmin samaye lokuttaram jhānam bhāveti niyyānikam apacaya gāmim diṭṭhi gatāna

original: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
analyzed: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicca iva kāmehi pe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, yā tasmiṁ samaye sati anussati sammāsati
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam dandha abhiñña yā tasmin samaye sati anussati sammā sati

analyzed: idha bhikkhu yasmin samaye lokuttaram jhānam bhāveti niyyānikam apacaya gāmim diṭṭhi gatāna

original: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
analyzed: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicca iva kāmehi pe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, yā tasmiṁ samaye upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā

original: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ
analyzed: idha bhikkhu yasmin samaye lokuttaram jhānam bhāveti niyyānikam apacaya gāmim diṭṭhi gatāna

original: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
analyzed: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicca iva kāmehi pe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti—
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam dandha abhiñña yaḥ tasmin samaye phassaḥ hoti pe avikkhepaḥ hoti

original: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṁ vivicceva kāmehi
analyzed: tassa iva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa kata ttā bhāvita ttā vipākam vivicca iva kāmehi

analyzed: idha bhikkhu yasmin samaye lokuttaram jhānam bhāveti niyyānikam apacaya gāmim diṭṭhi gatāna

analyzed: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicca iva kāmehi pe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam dandha abhiñña tasmin samaye phassaḥ hoti pe avikkhepaḥ hoti

analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam dandha abhiñña tasmin samaye phassaḥ hoti pe avikkhepaḥ hoti

original: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṁ vivicceva kāmehi
analyzed: tassa iva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa kata ttā bhāvita ttā vipākam vivicca iva kāmehi

original: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.

original: Sattannaṁ bojjhaṅgānaṁ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā …pe… kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?
analyzed: sattannam bojjhaṅgānam kati kusalā kati akusalā kati abyākatā pe kati saraṇā kati araṇā

original: cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
analyzed: cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā

original: Siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā.
analyzed: siyā sa vitakka sa vicārā siyā a vitakka vicāra mattā siyā a vitakka a vicārā

original: Pītisambojjhaṅgo na pītisahagato, sukhasahagato, na upekkhāsahagato;
analyzed: pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ na pīti sahagataḥ sukha sahagataḥ na upekkhā sahagataḥ

original: cha bojjhaṅgā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā.
analyzed: cha bojjhaṅgā siyā pīti sahagatā siyā sukha sahagatā siyā upekkhā sahagatā
na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā
na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukā
siyā apacaya gāmino siyā na iva ācaya gāminā apacaya gāmino

original: Na maggārammaṇā, siyā maggahetukā, siyā maggādhipatino;
analyzed: na magga ārammaṇā siyā magga hetukā siyā magga adhipatino
siyā na vattabbā magga hetukā atipi magga adhipatino tipi

original: Siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, siyā uppādino.
analyzed: siyā uppannā siyā anuppannā siyā uppādinaḥ

original: Siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā.
analyzed: siyā atītā siyā anāgatā siyā paccuppannā
na vattabbā atīta ārammaṇā atipi anāgata ārammaṇā atipi paccuppanna ārammaṇā atipi

original: Siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā.
analyzed: siyā ajjhattā siyā bahiddhā siyā ajjhatta bahiddhā
dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ hetu cha bojjhaṅgāḥ hetu sampayuttā

original: Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo hetu ceva sahetuko ca, cha bojjhaṅgā na vattabbā “hetū ceva sahetukā cā”ti, sahetukā ceva na ca hetū.
analyzed: dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ hetu ca iva sa hetukaḥ ca cha bojjhaṅgā na vattabbā hetū ca iva sa hetukā ca ati sa hetukā ca iva na ca hetū

original: Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca, cha bojjhaṅgā na vattabbā “hetū ceva hetusampayuttā cā”ti, hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū.
analyzed: dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgo hetu ca iva hetu sampayutto ca cha bojjhaṅgā na vattabbā hetū ca iva hetu sampayuttā ca ati hetu sampayuttā ca iva na ca hetū

original: Cha bojjhaṅgā na hetū sahetukā, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo na vattabbo “na hetusahetuko”tipi, “na hetuahetuko”tipi.
analyzed: cha bojjhaṅgā na hetū sa hetukā dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ na vattabbaḥ na hetu sahetukā utipi na hetu ahetukā utipi

original: Na vattabbā “āsavā ceva sāsavā cā”tipi, sāsavā ceva no ca āsavātipi.
analyzed: na vattabbā āsavā ca iva sa āsavā ca atipi sa āsavā ca iva no ca

original: Na vattabbā “āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā cā”tipi, “āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā”tipi.
analyzed: na vattabbā āsavā ca iva āsava sampayuttā ca atipi āsava sampayuttā ca iva no ca āsavā atipi
siyā sa vitakkā siyā a vitakkā

original: Pītisambojjhaṅgo appītiko, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sappītikā, siyā appītikā.
analyzed: pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ appītiko cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sappītikā siyā appītikā

original: Pītisambojjhaṅgo na pītisahagato, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā na pītisahagatā.
analyzed: pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ na pīti sahagataḥ bojjhaṅgā siyā pīti sahagatā siyā na pīti sahagatā

original: Pītisambojjhaṅgo sukhasahagato, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā na sukhasahagatā.
analyzed: pīti sambojjhaṅgo sukha sahagato bojjhaṅgā siyā sukha sahagatā siyā na sukha sahagatā

original: Pītisambojjhaṅgo na upekkhāsahagato, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā upekkhāsahagatā, siyā na upekkhāsahagatā.
analyzed: pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ na upekkhā sahagataḥ cha bojjhaṅgā siyā upekkhā sahagatā siyā na upekkhā sahagatā
